content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-11.5, 18.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -11.5, 18.5), boiler (position -21.5, 28.0), and offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5). The steam engine is currently not connected and has warnings indicating no input liquid and no fluid present in connections.

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 0.0, 0.0) and a furnace (position 0.0, 0.0)
- Burner mining drill (position 5.0, 5.0) and a furnace (position 5.0, 5.0)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position z1) and inserter (position a) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position y1 to the assembling machine at position z1

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place.

### Errors when placing pipes too far away
- Move closer to the target position before attempting to place pipes. The maximum distance for placing entities is 10 units.

### Errors when placing pipes overlapping water
- Ensure that the target position for placing pipes is not overlapping with water. Look for alternative locations that are clear of water.

### Errors when placing pipes at occupied positions
- Remove any existing entities at the target position before attempting to place a new entity.
